titleStmt.title: The Presbyterians loyalty and zeal for religion demonstrated in a letter by way of reply to a late fanatical pamphlet intituled The Knave uncloak'd, or, The Jesuit in its colours : shewing how industriously our modern rumpers endeavor ... to promote the good old cause : also proving Presbyterians to be schismaticks and bishops jure divino superior to presbyters : together with a serious and seasonable advertisement to all true and loyal Protestants.

notesStmt.note: Page 10 faded with loss of print. Beginning to page 17 from defective Edinburgh University Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
